enigma.ConserveLevel = FALSE
create_world(191, 97) oxyd_default_flavor="b"
-- Code homex=63.5 homey=38.5 finishx=136.5 finishy=90.5 xx=0
function start_timing() if xx == 0 then set_item("it-wormhole", 136, 90, {targetx=175.5, targety=90.5}) xx=1 else enigma.KillItem(136,90) enigma.KillStone(135,89) enigma.KillStone(136,89) enigma.KillStone(137,89) enigma.KillStone(135,90) enigma.KillStone(136,90) enigma.KillStone(137,90) enigma.KillStone(135,91) enigma.KillStone(136,91) enigma.KillStone(137,91) SendMessage("timer1","off") end end
function puzzle1() puzzle({" # ", "###### ", " ## ###", " ##### ", " # "}, {41,39}, "redpuzzle", "permutation") end
function refill() local water = 0 local floor = enigma.GetFloor(131, 18) local water1 = false local water2 = false local water3 = false if floor ~= nil then if GetKind(floor) == "fl-water" then water = water + 1 water1 = true end end floor = enigma.GetFloor(131, 19) if floor ~= nil then if GetKind(floor) == "fl-water" then water = water + 1 water2 = true end end floor = enigma.GetFloor(132, 19) if floor ~= nil then if GetKind(floor) == "fl-water" then water = water + 1 water3 = true end end if water > 0 then local obj = enigma.GetItem(132, 18) local didFill = 0 if obj == nil then if water == 3 then set_item("it-document", 132, 18, {text="text13"}) end else if GetKind(obj) == "it-extinguisher_empty" then set_item("it-extinguisher_medium", 132, 18, {}) water = water -1 didFill = 1 else if GetKind(obj) == "it-extinguisher_medium" and water > 1 then set_item("it-extinguisher", 132, 18, {}) water = water - 2 didFill = 2 end end end if didFill >= 1 and water1 then set_floor("fl-swamp", 131, 18, {}) didFill = didFill - 1 end if didFill >= 1 and water2 then set_floor("fl-swamp", 131, 19, {}) didFill = didFill - 1 end if didFill >= 1 and water3 then set_floor("fl-swamp", 132, 19, {}) end end end

el:string.el:english: As Far As My Feet Will Carry Me

el:string.el:translation: Nanu, wo bin ich denn jetzt??

el:string.el:english: Moments ago i've been at home and wanted to take care about my two oxyd stones.
el:string.el:translation: Gerade war ich doch noch zu Hause, und wollte mich um meine beiden Oxydsteine kÃ¼mmern.

el:string.el:english: And now i'm stranded in this weird forest. How can i escape from here?
el:string.el:translation: Und jetzt sitze ich hier in diesem unheimlichen Wald fest. Wie komme ich hier bloss wieder heraus?

el:string.el:english: If i should have a look-around? Perhaps i can find some things that could help me to find an exit.
el:string.el:translation: Ob ich mich vielleicht einmal etwas umsehe? Vielleicht finde ich ein paar Sachen, die mir auf der Suche nach dem Ausgang helfen kÃ¶nnen.

el:string.el:english: Wild buffaloes are crossing the way.
Help me, the forest is on fire!
A herd of wild horses blocks the way.
el:string.el:translation: Eine Herde Wildpferde verperrt den Weg.

el:string.el:english: A small hamlet with a fence, a few huts, a pond, some bales of straw.
el:string.el:translation: Ein kleines Dorf mit einem Zaun, ein paar HÃ¼tten, ein Teich, ein paar Strohballen.

el:string.el:english: If there is finally an exit?
el:string.el:translation: Ob es hier endlich einen Ausgang gibt?

el:string.el:english: I'm afraid, i need some assistance!
el:string.el:translation: Ich fÃ¼rchte, hier brauche ich fremde Hilfe!

el:string.el:english: Useful things may also be hidden!
el:string.el:translation: NÃ¼tzliche Sachen kÃ¶nnen auch versteckt sein!
